postData.contentHtml:
Welcome to my blog! In this first post, I'd like to share some of the resources that have helped me learn. I hope they can be helpful for you too. If you know of any other useful resources, feel free to send me a message on X and I'll take a look and possibly add them to the list.

AI and robotics are enormous fields with many different areas to explore. Personally, I tend to focus on...

  • Reinforcement Learning to continuous control.
  • Simulation and control for Robotics systems.
  • Computer Architecture trends for accelerate neural networks and Robotics.

Yeah is a lot!!!.

Books

  • Deep Learning
  • Grokking Deep Learning by andrew trask I love this book it is very simple to understand.
  • Reinforcement Learning:an introduction the bible of RL.
  • Computer-Controlled Systems: Theory and Design
  • Modern Robotics
  • Computer Systems: A Programmer's Perspective
  • Digital Design and Computer Architecture
  • The Art of Electronics

Blogs

  • Lilâ€™Log
  • Openai blog
  • Deepmind blog
  • Carnegie Mellon blog
  • SAIL blog
  • BAIR blog
  • Nvidia technical blog

Courses

  • Coursera Reinforcement learning
  • Berkeley Reinforcement learning
  • Deepmind Reinforcement learning youtube
  • NYU Deep learning
  • https://www.learnpytorch.io/

Sources

  • Google Scholar to find research papers.
  • arXiv research papers.
  • Papers with code to find papers with code examples.
  • Distill interactive articles about AI.
  • spinning up a good intro to RL.
  • The AI Epiphany Aleksa Gordic youtube channel.
  • Steve Brunton youtube channel. Math stuff
  • 3blue1brown youtube channel Best for math stuff
postData.title: My learning resources
